text: Allaha nai ta ho jasale timila'i srsti garyo, ani timila'i jivika diyo, ani timila'i usale mrtyu dinecha ani timila'i jivita garnecha. Ke timile sajhedara thaharakaharumadhye pani kohi yasto cha, jasale yi kamaharumadhye kehi garna sakos. Allahako lagi pavitrata ra sresthata cha uniharuka sajhedaraharubata
